data.heading: Jump to Topic
data.subheading: Or jump right to a specific topic to help you build your site.

cards.heading: How Stackbit Works →
cards.subheading: Follow an end-to-end guide to learn the inner-workings of Stackbit.

cards.heading: Pages →
cards.subheading: Add a new type of page to your site, while touching on content modeling and data retrieval.

cards.heading: Components →
cards.subheading: Make components editable, add styles, and provide content presets to speed up content editing.

cards.heading: Styling →
cards.subheading: Set up global styles and add a styling toolbar to individual components in the visual editor.
